thread.section_title: Scan Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Scan | scan.com
thread.title: David Middlemas

author: David Middlemas
title: David Middlemas
text: Place my order on a Saturday just after 12pm for a Intel nuc and some ram to upgrade it. Received a confirmation email within minutes that my order was confirmed and with a hour a second email notifying me that it had been dispatched. To my misfortune I choose Dpd over ups at the time of checkout. After reading there reviews here including my own which I left them I will never use Dpd again but will be using scan again in the future.
